Sentence.value: The hair on your head may come out in clumps.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[hair|C0018494]] on your [[head|C0018670]] may come out in clumps.

Sentence.value: If you lose some, but not all of your hair, there are many ways you can be gentle with the hair you have.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If you lose some, but not all of your [[hair|C0018494]], there are many ways you can be gentle with the [[hair|C0018494]] you have.

Sentence.value: - Put away things that will put stress on your hair.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Put away things that will put [[stress|C0038435]] on your [[hair|C0018494]].
